name: Duck Challenge
description:
Journey through the colorful, simplistic and amazing world that is Duck Challenge. What seems like an easy relaxed journey in the beginning, is destined to become fraught with danger. With simple one tap controls, you’ll need fast reactions, cunning timing and nerves of steel to reach the safety of the checkpoints.
Guide a lost duck through a minimal world of challenge platforms.

Features:
• Over 50 Checkpoints to reach
• Amazing Minimal World
• Relax Ambient Soundtrack
• Simple One-Touch Controls
